title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed APIs as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that plugs any Ollama model into chains, agents, retrieval, and tool-calling pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama: multi-model convos, PDF uploads, RAG, admin panel, dark/light themes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & async APIs, streaming, and Kotlin coroutines.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST endpoints; supports chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Unofficial Go CLI with fzf model picker, chat repl, and progress bars; great for scripting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant with autocomplete & chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection & autoscaling.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker-Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, and GPU support for quick local or server install.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chatbot, voice assistant, function-calling, Next.js apps, and fine-tuning tips.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models offline; supports Windows, macOS, Linux.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that brings Ollama chat, code explanation, and generation directly into the editor.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter exposing an OpenAI-compatible REST & SSE endpoint powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI summarization, brainstorming, and Q&A using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama replies, supports slash commands, system prompts & model swap.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel-based AI conversations.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that pre-pulls models, runs benchmarks, and packages GPU containers.
